MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW8 postcode area of Sandiway, affecting properties in Tarporley Road, Kennel Lane and the surrounding area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 7:13 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because further investigations are required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30 am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:59 am on 28th December, 2020.
